# stall
# flush
# op.aluop					string
# op.alusrc1				1 bin
# op.alusrc2				1 bin
# op.alusrc3				1 bin 
# op.rs1					5 bin
# op.rs2					5 bin
# op.readdata1				8 hex
# op.readdata2				8 hex
# op.imm					8 hex
# pc_in						4 hex
# memop_in.branch 			string
# memop_in.mem.mem_read 	1 bin
# memop_in.mem.mem_write 	1 bin
# memop_in.mem.memtype 		string
# wbop_in.rd 				5 bin
# wbop_in.write 			1 bin
# wbop_in.src 				string
